A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terribly disappointing. Usually I think that Star Wars fans are impossible to please and should just relax and enjoy a film for the entertainment of it. But this time I understand their bile completely.  I tried really hard to like it\, but 3/4 of the way through I couldn't deny it anymore\, Disney was really trashing Star Wars and its fans.  The stupid answers to question people excitedly discussed for the past two years were a thumb in the eye.  The less said about the bizarre agenda pushing in this film the better.  The two stars are solely for the visuals\, which were stunning.  I am definitely not in a hurry to see another Star Wars film.
